version_description:
Hit the holidays runnin’ with a special seasonal discount on Sonic Runners Adventure! Enjoy all the high-speed fun now for just $0.99!
The whole Sonic gang’s been busy stomping out bugs while dashing through the game. So enjoy a smoother experience than ever as you play!

Sonic and his friends can’t wait to heat things up, so they’re blazing into new adventures full of baddies and legendary locations!

Having lots of good, fast fun? Rate Sonic Runners Adventure now, and let everyone know your true-blue opinion!
